title: Mozzarella bruschetta with shaved fennel and courgette
description: To make this rustic nibble daintier, cut rounds from the toast with a cookie cutter and pile a little topping onto each.
ingredients: ½ small fennel bulb, herby tops reserved
small bunch fresh mint, torn into pieces
½ orange, skin removed, thinly sliced into rounds
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 garlic clove, peeled, cut in half
